amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the FEC from considering background music when determining whether a communication constitutes express advocacy for purposes of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that the FEC may not include background music or lyrics to determine whether broadcast advertisement is "express advocacy".

action.text: Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Blunt to the Shays amendment (A002).
Blunt amendment (A031) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Blunt amendment (A031) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
